achievements.title: Multimodal AI Assistant
achievements.description: Created a multimodal AI assistant that automates browser tasks for users, winning the AWS for Startups prize.

achievements.title: Cloud-based Video Face Recognition App
achievements.description: Designed a three-tier hybrid cloud architecture integrating AWS and OpenStack, with Python scripts for Lambda triggers, S3, and DynamoDB, auto-scaling 20 EC2 instances.

achievements.title: Voice AI Interviewer Agent
achievements.description: Engineered an AI-powered voice interviewer utilizing Groq for fast inference and Vapi for voice interactions, with a custom evaluation system and Supabase for storage.

achievements.title: Microservices Video to MP3 Converter
achievements.description: Developed a distributed system using microservices architecture for video-to-MP3 conversion, implementing JWT authentication and message queuing with RabbitMQ.

achievements.title: OFSAA Fintech Solutions Implementation
achievements.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT, and production environments for two international financial firms.

achievements.title: System Scalability Optimization
achievements.description: Optimized the system scalability and performance by refining data processing pipelines and improving time complexity at NREL.

achievements.title: Debugging Made Easier Blog
achievements.description: Maintained a technical blog with posts like “Adding Local Directory to GitHub Repository” and “Renaming Multiple Files At Once“.
